text:
It is found when the tumor begins to grow and cause signs or symptoms. Sometimes it forms before birth and is found during a fetal ultrasound.   By the time neuroblastoma is diagnosed, the cancer has usually metastasized (spread). Neuroblastoma spreads most often to the lymph nodes, bones, bone marrow, and liver. In infants, it also spreads to the skin.",CancerGov,Neuroblastoma
Is Neuroblastoma inherited ?,"Neuroblastoma is sometimes caused by a gene mutation (change) passed from the parent to
